characters: Driver of a white sedan, motorcyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving through a residential area. A white sedan is ahead, moving slowly. A motorcyclist appears from the right side, moving towards the left side of the frame, potentially causing a collision.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while following the white sedan ahead. The motorcyclists sudden appearance from the right side prompts the vehicle to decelerate to avoid a collision.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 20 meters away, moving slowly. 2) Right: A motorcyclist, approximately 5 meters away, moving towards the left side of the frame, potentially causing a collision.
